title: Ryker
description: Our lives aren’t beautiful or glamorous.They’re dirty and fucked up.We live the nightmares people live in fear of.We live on the edge of the law wondering when it will finally catch up with us or who will bury us before that happens. But its the outlaw life we chose. It was a choice we all made, and I wouldn’t fuckin’ take it back. Not ever.Until she walked into my life and made me second guess everything, I have ever known. She is an angel, and I am tainted in darkness.She is pure perfection, and I am stained and bloodied.I want her, but I know I will never have her.I just hope that I can come to terms with the fact that she belongs to someone else, and there is nothing I can ever do about it.My name is Ryker, and this is my story.
author: Dawn  Robertson
